title: Reliance Asks Telecom Regulator To Review Reach Of Starlink, Amazon: Report
content: Billionaire Mukesh Ambani's Reliance has asked the telecom regulator to review the potential reach of Elon Musk's Starlink and Amazon's Kuiper before awarding satellite spectrum amid concerns local players could suffer, a letter showed on Friday.
summary: Billionaire Mukesh Ambani's Reliance has asked the telecom regulator to review the potential reach of Elon Musk's Starlink and Amazon's Kuiper before awarding satellite spectrum amid concerns local players could suffer, a letter showed on Friday.

title: Trump "More Nuanced" On Ukraine Than Assumed, Says German Chancellor
content: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said in an interview published Friday that Donald Trump privately held "more nuanced" positions on Ukraine, days after he spoke with the president-elect of the United States by phone.
summary: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz said in an interview published Friday that Donald Trump privately held "more nuanced" positions on Ukraine, days after he spoke with the president-elect of the United States by phone.

title: US Finalises Up To $6.6 Billion Funding For Taiwanese Chip Giant TSMC
content: The United States will award Taiwanese chip giant TSMC up to $6.6 billion in direct funding to help build several plants on US soil, officials said Friday, finalizing the deal before a new administration enters the White House.
summary: The United States will award Taiwanese chip giant TSMC up to $6.6 billion in direct funding to help build several plants on US soil, officials said Friday, finalizing the deal before a new administration enters the White House.

title: "Benefits Outweighed By Negatives": News Outlets Quit Musk's X
content: News outlets have begun quitting X, formerly Twitter, once a favourite of global media but now accused of enabling the spread of disinformation under its owner, president-elect Donald Trump ally Elon Musk.
summary: News outlets have begun quitting X, formerly Twitter, once a favourite of global media but now accused of enabling the spread of disinformation under its owner, president-elect Donald Trump ally Elon Musk.

title: This Creature Could Take Over Earth If Humanity Disappears, Scientists Warn
content: As humanity faces existential threats, scientists have speculated which species could rise to dominance in the event of human extinction.
summary: As humanity faces existential threats, scientists have speculated which species could rise to dominance in the event of human extinction.

title: "America Demanded It": Comedian Conan O'Brien To Host Oscars
content: Comedian Conan O'Brien, a former late-night television host, will be the emcee for the Oscars for the first time, taking over from fellow funnyman Jimmy Kimmel, organizers said Friday.
summary: Comedian Conan O'Brien, a former late-night television host, will be the emcee for the Oscars for the first time, taking over from fellow funnyman Jimmy Kimmel, organizers said Friday.

title: India's Most Advanced Satellite Launch From US Is Elon Musk's 'Trump' Card
content: SpaceX, the company owned by 'The First Buddy' of US President-elect Donald Trump, is the first big beneficiary of a multi-million dollar deal inked by India's space agency.
summary: SpaceX, the company owned by 'The First Buddy' of US President-elect Donald Trump, is the first big beneficiary of a multi-million dollar deal inked by India's space agency.

title: Six Warning Signs Of Highly Contagious Virus - Why Staying Home Is Crucial
content: Common symptoms include nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea, fever, headaches, and exhaustion, with the risk of dehydration, particularly in vulnerable groups.
summary: Common symptoms include nausea, vomiting, diarrhoea, fever, headaches, and exhaustion, with the risk of dehydration, particularly in vulnerable groups.

title: UK Notices Russian Bomber, Naval Ships Head Towards It, Scrambles Jets
content: UK today scrambled fighter jets today after it noticed a Russian bomber approach its airspace. While Royal Air Force was tracking the Russian jet, the Royal Navy found two separate groups of Russian Navy ships near its waters in the English Channel.
summary: UK today scrambled fighter jets today after it noticed a Russian bomber approach its airspace. While Royal Air Force was tracking the Russian jet, the Royal Navy found two separate groups of Russian Navy ships near its waters in the English Channel.

title: US Secret Service Agent Took Lover To Obama's Bathroom For Sex, Got Fired
content: A Secret Service agent, assigned to Barack Obama's detail, was recently fired after he landed in hot water for allegedly bringing a lover to the former US President's beachfront property in Hawaii.
summary: A Secret Service agent, assigned to Barack Obama's detail, was recently fired after he landed in hot water for allegedly bringing a lover to the former US President's beachfront property in Hawaii.

title: Viral Blue-Eyed Pakistani Tea Seller Bags 10 Million For Cafe In Shark Tank
content: Who would have thought that the viral blue-eyed tea seller would one day demand Rs 1 crore (around Rs 30 lakh Indian rupees) on Shark Tank Pakistan for a five per cent equity in his cafe called Cafe Chai Wala?
summary: Who would have thought that the viral blue-eyed tea seller would one day demand Rs 1 crore (around Rs 30 lakh Indian rupees) on Shark Tank Pakistan for a five per cent equity in his cafe called Cafe Chai Wala?

title: Sri Lankan President's Party Wins Majority, Has Complex History With India
content: The sweeping mandate to the left coalition underlines widening support for his leftist policies, giving him the power to push through his plans to fight poverty and graft in the island nation struggling to emerge from the worst financial crisis.
summary: The sweeping mandate to the left coalition underlines widening support for his leftist policies, giving him the power to push through his plans to fight poverty and graft in the island nation struggling to emerge from the worst financial crisis.

title: UK PM's Office Apologises After Outrage Over Non-Veg Food At Diwali Party
content: Prime Minister Keir Starmer's office on Friday apologised for a "mistake" in the organisation of its Diwali reception at 10 Downing Street after some British Hindus objected to non-vegetarian food and alcohol being served at the gathering.
summary: Prime Minister Keir Starmer's office on Friday apologised for a "mistake" in the organisation of its Diwali reception at 10 Downing Street after some British Hindus objected to non-vegetarian food and alcohol being served at the gathering.

title: 2 Drunk Soldiers Caught Having Sex Inside Rs 75 Crore Military Chopper In UK
content: Noticing the rotors of an Apache helicopter making unusual movements at a military training area in the UK, maintenance staff decided to check and were surprised to find two soldiers having sex inside.
summary: Noticing the rotors of an Apache helicopter making unusual movements at a military training area in the UK, maintenance staff decided to check and were surprised to find two soldiers having sex inside.

title: "Audible Gasps" As Trump Picks Loyalists Over Qualified For Top Posts
content: The structure of Trump 2.0 White House has left leaders "stunned" and "appalled", with some of his choices even rubbing Republicans the wrong way.
summary: The structure of Trump 2.0 White House has left leaders "stunned" and "appalled", with some of his choices even rubbing Republicans the wrong way.

title: Opinion: Will Trump Try To Unite America? What His Nominations Tell Us
content: If you're looking for an insight that helps explain what happened in the US election and why it happened, consider this observation from a key player in US politics: "There is a difference between what offends people and what affects them."
summary: If you're looking for an insight that helps explain what happened in the US election and why it happened, consider this observation from a key player in US politics: "There is a difference between what offends people and what affects them."

title: Meet Anura Kumara Dissanayake, Sri Lanka's New President
content: Anura Kumara Dissanayake was born in Thambuththegama, Sri Lanka, into a working-class family.
summary: Anura Kumara Dissanayake was born in Thambuththegama, Sri Lanka, into a working-class family.

title: Saudi Minister Cites India's Efforts In Fighting Land Degradation, Drought
content: As Saudi capital Riyadh gets ready to host the Conference of the Parties (COP16) of the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD), Dr Osama Faqeeha, Deputy Minister of Environment, Water and Agriculture, has praised India's efforts.
summary: As Saudi capital Riyadh gets ready to host the Conference of the Parties (COP16) of the United Nations Convention to Combat Desertification (UNCCD), Dr Osama Faqeeha, Deputy Minister of Environment, Water and Agriculture, has praised India's efforts.

title: More Than 80% Of Indians Exposed To Climate-Related Health Risks
content: Almost everyone in India is now vulnerable to the impacts of climate change, former chief scientist of the World Health Organisation Dr Soumya Swaminathan has said.
summary: Almost everyone in India is now vulnerable to the impacts of climate change, former chief scientist of the World Health Organisation Dr Soumya Swaminathan has said.

title: Demand For Abortion Pill Requests Soars In US After Trump Win
content: Aid Access, the leading supplier of abortion pills by mail in the US, received over 5,000 requests in less than 12 hours.
summary: Aid Access, the leading supplier of abortion pills by mail in the US, received over 5,000 requests in less than 12 hours.
